author: rwesten
msg: changes required for STANBOL-1246: This removes javax.transaction.* from the frameworkfragment - meaning that they are no longer exported by the system bundle. To compensate it adds a bundle providing JTA 1.1 to the bundlelist of the CMS Adapter as org.apache.jackrabbit:jackrabbit-api does require JTA.
